The recommendations were developed by the Safely Reopen CCISD Committee, a group of health professionals, parents, students, staff and community members. They were charged with developing the 'what' in terms of what we need to focus on to reopen and now staff will now work to develop the 'how' as we move forward with plans to reopen on August 18. All of those important details will emerge over the next several weeks. The District also expects more guidance from the state tomorrow.
